author: Daniel Greene
description:
Use GREENE2 to get 55% off your first month at Scentbird https://sbird.co/42ZIlyM
Welcome back to Fantasy News!
This week we’ve got new releases, controversies, adaptations, and the long-awaited return of Hugo drama. From Adrian Tchaikovsky’s Warhammer novel to ACX’s updated terms and a Guillermo del Toro quote for the ages, let’s dive in.
